text: Pogonissonkaha (often shortened to Pogo) is a village in the far north of Ivory Coast. It is in the sub-prefecture of Ferkessédougou, Ferkessédougou Department, Tchologo, Savanes District. Pogonissonkaha was a commune until March 2012, when it became one of 1126 communes nationwide that were abolished. ==Notes== Category:Former communes of Ivory Coast Category:Populated places in Savanes District Category:Populated places in Tchologo
title: Pogonissonkaha
